name: Google (search results) - Link Warning addition
description:
For those users using a cursor changing Link Warning type style (i.e., style 2538) this style returns the cursor to a pointer on the line with "similar pages."  Otherwise, if that link is to a filetype, those links unnecessarily turn into the icon for that filetype.

...nothing more that cleaning up shop...

Enjoy!

(03/08/08 - Updated to include the inexplicable addition of the "http://www.l.google.com" domain)
